website_summaries.verdict: The Bose SoundLink Around-Ear II is a lightweight, exceptionally comfortable pair of Bluetooth headphones with high-quality sound and a high price.
pros: Solid audio performance with rich bass and bright highs
Includes a cable for passive, wired listening
Multipoint functionality allows you to pair two devices at once

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant...... but
customer_reviews.text: Look brilliant... sound brilliant... they fit lovely and have good features......but....after several months of use the headband started to crack and peel looking anything but stylish.. I was quickly on to Bose about this matter and to be fair to Bose they dealt with the matter imeadiately giving me a new replacement headset asap...I will put a couple of pictures on to show others what happened. I would have given these 5 stars if it wasn’t for the headband cracking but again a big thumbs up to Bose for acting fast and resolving the issue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awful background electric interference
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for myself for a Christmas present from my wife. Really looking forward to them too! The build quality was really good and they are amazingly comfy to wear with many adjustments. There was a faint constant noise interference in the right earpiece so I returned them. I would have ordered a replacement pair but after researching the issue I found it to be quite popular with the headset with some people seeing the issue on day 1 and other people noticing it later down the line which has completed put me off and I expect better from a company like Bose so I thought I would leave this review to share the awareness of the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sound quality....and comes with a carry case!!!!
customer_reviews.text: awesome sound quality and easy to use. Do not however buy the carry case as recommended by amazon as the product already comes with a carry case. the "often bought" with is very misleading.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Murphy

customer_reviews.title: If only it didn't break after less than a month.
customer_reviews.text: Pro's: - great sound - obviously it's Bose! - sleek appeal - Does look and feel expensive - Ability to pair with 2 devices at the same time. Cons: - Doesn't fold that small, so you're left with quite a big case to carry around - It being white, made that it would get dirty quite easily. - After using it longer than an hour, the sound would start breaking. The only way around it is to turn off the bluetooth connection and to reconnect it again. I called Bose support centre to report the issue, but they told me that it could take up to a month to get a replacement device
customer_reviews.author: Britttsle

customer_reviews.title: These are the greatest ever headphones
customer_reviews.text: So I've had these for five months and they are truly awesome. The most important thing - the sound quality - is just wonderful. Rich, textured, great balance across all the ranges. Luxurious sound, so much so, they make my ears happy. Next up, how they feel on your head. THEY FEEL AMAZING!!!!! Super light, you could wear these all day with no discomfort. And they are well made, super robust. And yet light. And while these are not noise isolating, they do an unbelievable job of blocking out background noise on the train. A commuter's dream! I have bought a lot of headphones during my 50 years on this planet. These are a revelation. Hallelujah. They rock. Genuinely.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I am a huge fan of Bose products and I bought these Headphones as I really like the combination of black and blue. The sound quality is absolutely amazing, and even if there are not described as Noise cancellation headphones I honestly cannot hear anything else except my music when I commute 4 hours every day. The best feature for me is that are very easy to connect them with any Bluetooth device and I am having them connected with my phone and my ipod and I can listen my music and when my phone rings automatically announces me that I have a call and I can pick up the call- so wonderful combination
customer_reviews.author: AL

customer_reviews.title: Great but really wears down in time
customer_reviews.text: I had this for years now (even bought another one when the faux-leather started chipping on my first pair) and sadly despite the great quality in sound, the aesthetics leave a lot to be desired for. The ear foams could be replaced at least but my main problem was the faux-leather disintegrating on top of the headphones. Really bad to look at. Sound quality is great as one could expect from Bose, I just wish they would do better with their materials.
customer_reviews.author: thevillagecrone

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones 🎧
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my husband. I am not going to write a ‘tech’ review because I just don’t have the knowledge! However I can tell you, it took me along time to choose then and he’s now been using for 8 weeks and say’s they are great. Despite not being advertised as ‘noise cancelling’ he said they do a great job compared to his old Phillips ones. I can always hear him clearly when he answers the phone so that’s a great 👍 too.
customer_reviews.author: Loobie loo

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Set of Headphones
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are fantastic, and the fact that they are wireless is brilliant, only major downside is the price but I would say it's worth it. I use them for listening to music and watching movies on my phone and there's no problems what so ever. The battery life is great, could easily use this for 2-3 days straight without needing a charge. Do take into account that these are over the ear headphones, they do heat up your ears but you get used to it. Would definitely recommend for anyone keen on a good quality set of headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Conor

customer_reviews.title: Hisses at low volume
customer_reviews.text: Ambient hiss at low volumes. NOT acceptable at this price point. My Bose QC 35 IIs don't have that problem, so why do these? Returning for refund.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Superb!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing sound from these headphones. I use them for work (Skype calls), but also for listening to music. Granted they do not block out every single sound, but they are perfect for what I need. A number of my colleagues have also bought them having listened to mine. Battery life is excellent - seems to last for ages! Easily connect to my laptop and to my Android phone. I would recommend downloading the Bose Connect app (available from the Bose website) just in case it doesn't pair immediately with your phone. I was toying between these and the Sony noise cancelling headset, but opted for these based on other reviews. I cannot fault them!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing sound quality
customer_reviews.text: I generally like Bose products which tend to be fairly bass heavy, which I like for movies and classical (organ) music. These headphones were totally lacking in Bass which made the sound 'thin' and the product sound really cheap. They have been sent straight back. I expected a much better sound quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: mgmcc

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely amazing headphones
customer_reviews.text: These are absolutely fantastic. After researching loads of bluetooth headset, my husband is thrilled with these. We had a problem with the first ones that arrived, no sound was coming out of the right speaker. Seller sent a replacement immediately which arrived within 2 days and these ones are amazing. They are lightweight and don't look too big on his head.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Dalton

customer_reviews.title: Excellent headphones, really clear sound and superb battery life
customer_reviews.text: Excellent headphones, really clear sound and superb battery life... I use them everyday, and although they do block out sound, I wish I’d spent a bit more for the Noise Cancelling version. I would suggest buying a longer USB to micro USB cable, the one supplied is a bit too short... but overall, I’m really satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Martin1980

customer_reviews.title: The best headphones i have bought ever !!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: wow what great headphones , i had these to replace a previous Bose over the ear headphones , which unfortunately not available in stock anymore, so i took a leap of faith and ordered these, with these being Bose there was nothing to worry about. the pairing on both devices i wanted ( smartphone and tablet) really easy and took minutes, and now for the sound simply this best sound in a pair of headphones ever !!!!, I know the price is a eye watering but it is so worth the price don't hesitate try them.
customer_reviews.author: WINNIE THE POOH

customer_reviews.title: Music is beautiful again!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing all round - full, clear, pristine sound quality. Very comfortable to wear for longer periods. Listening to really high-quality recorded tracks, really show the capability of the headphones. Never had a really good pair of headphones (most ever paid was around £50), not interested in the fad/fashion headphones, I just wanted pure quality... that's what I got... thanks Bose!
customer_reviews.author: ChandlerGreg

customer_reviews.title: These are convenient and comfortable headphones
customer_reviews.text: These are convenient and comfortable headphones. Being able to walk about with no wire is great. The downside is the sound quality does take a hit when listening over Bluetooth connection. The sound can seem flat and you may question the value of the headphones. Use the provided headphone jack and the sound is opened up and a lot better, although you lose the convenience of Bluetooth. If you’re buying these headphones purely for sound quality, I would look to buying the wired version. If however, you would rather the freedom of Bluetooth headphones, these headphones are sufficient. I also own the Bluetooth soundsport buds. These headphones have a better sound stage than them, but less bass.
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Sent back  - sound quality not great & microphone unusable
customer_reviews.text: Rubbish ! Having been a loyal Bose fan for years, I was expecting the usual superior product......not so with these headphones. The sound quality was poor, and the microphone so bad I was unable to be heard when I made calls. Tried a re-set as per Bose forums but the problems still occurred. Have sent them back for a refund. Really disappointed. If you google microphone issues with these headphones it would seem that I'm not the only person with problems, so there's obviously an ongoing unfixed issue with these. Sort it out Bose !!
customer_reviews.author: G Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Get the best
customer_reviews.text: Really happy so far (day 4) with these headphones-tried two cheaper brands but had to send them back as they were faulty. So bit the bullet and invested in these babies. I use them for about 6 hours a day-on the train and in the office and even though there is no noise cancelling feature they do isolate most background noises. Comfortable (I wear specs) and good tone and bass. Bluetooth is working well and was easy to set up and battery life is good-can last me about 12 hours before recharge but they come with a jack too. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: E. Davies

customer_reviews.title: These are a great product so far.
customer_reviews.text: These where a present for my partner that she only just got for Christmas so I can't speak for battery life or durability. However the sound quality is amazing, they look great on her and so far a few hours listening has not put a dent in the battery so they seem a great product. I looked at a few alternatives like beats but the beats build quality was questionable and the sound quality when compared to bose is disappointing so I got the bose which are very high quality with amazing sound. A little lacking in base but that's the price you pay to hear every note in perfect clarity.
customer_reviews.author: David Griffin

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: First impressions these are just OK. Sound quality is no better than my Beltron at 1/5 the price. Not very loud and sound terrible switched off ie using cable on phone. Also the cable is non standard at one end, so pain when it breaks. Bluetooth is not compatible with ps4. Shame as I like the style, size and fit! Every pair of headphones I have purchased over the year's have failed to improve on an old Sony pair from the early 90's. Sound better with Denon hifi but not purchased for that purpose.
customer_reviews.author: MikeInTheGutter

customer_reviews.title: Very selective in when it pairs with devices. Can ...
customer_reviews.text: Very selective in when it pairs with devices. Can take up to an hour to pair, can't find iphone or ipad. Most frustrating. I may just have a duff pair?
customer_reviews.author: Nicolas G.

customer_reviews.title: Great Headphones
customer_reviews.text: I originally ordered a pair of these Bose headphones for my husbands birthday and he loved them so decided to purchase a pair for myself . As well as the great sound I am so pleased with how comfortable they are around my ears I have purchased other around ear headphones in the past and no sooner had I started listening to music when my ears got really sore and the headphones had to be removed .A big thankyou to Amazon for the interest free easy payments which made my decision to purchase a lot easier .
customer_reviews.author: catlover

customer_reviews.title: Awful and useless for phone calls
customer_reviews.text: These are decent headphones for listening to music but using for calls these headphones are truly awful. I can hear people when they call me but they can’t hear me. They hear people 10metres away more than me. So as headphones to make calls they are pointless and useless. Maybe I have faulty ones as they are Bose but for what I paid they are a waste of money. I bought a cheap pair of £30 wireless headphones and they were 100 times better than these for calls. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Mr JPS FINN

customer_reviews.title: The best headphones I've ever had.
customer_reviews.text: I use these to connect to my Samsung S7 Edge to listen to music (rock and blues). They are my 3rd pair of Bose headphones/earphones (OE2 and IE2) and the best to date. They connected to Bluetooth straight out of the box. The sound stage is superb. I've only had them for 2 hours and I've not taken them off yet. I use them with the Rocket music app (paid version) which has a 10 band graphic and can hear things I've never heard before. One small complaint. The charging cable is only 30cm long. Thankfully I have a longer cable otherwise I'd have to lay them on the floor beside the socket. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Johnstone

customer_reviews.title: Really stylish, light and sounds great
customer_reviews.text: I really like these headphones. They are as advertised and as privately reviewed as I checked them all before purchase. I am NOT disappointed. The soft leather, padding and weight of them are all really comfortable to wear. The sound quality is excellent as you would expect from Bose. Could not quite give it full stars for noise cancelling, but this is not an issue for me. The life of the battery really is a game changer here- far outstripping the competition.
customer_reviews.author: Rubyros

customer_reviews.title: A few months and the rubber peels off.
customer_reviews.text: I've owned two sets of these, every time the blue rubber coating on the outside peels off. Bose replaced the headset once through their warranty, but the same problem happens again, this time outside of warranty. Their solution: Buy a new pair. Won't ever be buying Bose again despite good sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: Zaazu

customer_reviews.title: Excellent headphones
customer_reviews.text: Purchased so I can watch tv in the evening without disturbing others. They work a treat, sound is excellent, they allow you to hear everything clearly, battery life is very good and the headphones let you know every time you switch them on how much life is left. Only downside for me is that they are a bit large and it’s not possible to make them slightly smaller, I don’t have an overly small head, if there had been a star for fit I would have given a two. Even though they are a little big they are still comfy, more comfy than Beats headphones, and better quality sound.
customer_reviews.author: starbuck69

customer_reviews.title: Wow - Bose
customer_reviews.text: What a reasonable price for a top quality product from a top manufacturer. Did not think these would be such an immersive sound - wonderful. You can 'tune out from the world' into your own concert theatre without leaving home. I urge you not to buy cheap imitations - go for quality and you will be amazed. Thank You Bose, for making such stylish, beautiful, comfortable headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Bookworm

customer_reviews.title: Quality stylists light in weight design.
customer_reviews.text: Wow, Bose headset are very good. For the price they needed to be. Comparing with others I have this beats them in all ways. The added Alexa/google/ assist is really a good touch. The battery last for ever plus, the charging time super quick. Sound is top quality without bad bluetooth interference. Allows quick auto connection to your paired devices. Mic operates Iike a dream compared to other cheaper headset. Providing the reception is good in the area hearing is great. Clear as a bell. The price put me off at first. But now trying them out for myself. Im glad I brought it.
customer_reviews.author: Top Cat

customer_reviews.title: Just bought this!
customer_reviews.text: Just ordered this and it arrived ahead of schedule. Great to be able to buy this on a 5 month interest free payment scheme. Switched on, put into discovery mode, connect on ipod and it was ready. Very simple and quick. Music sound is really very good. These phones sit nicely over your ears, so no discomfort from ears being squashed and aching. They do look a little bulky on your head but who cares! I was expecting them to have better noise cancelling than they do.........but they're headphones at the end of the day. Can't complain at this point.
customer_reviews.author: Dai Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Awsome sound
customer_reviews.text: I'd been looking at these for a while. I've spent quite allot on cheap headphones over the years... some going straight in the bin they were so bad so I decided to see how a premium product would compare. They live up to the reputation that's for sure! The sound is rich and clear, sound great at high and low volume. They are light and comfortable. But the sound is the main thing it's like hearing all my favourite tracks for the first time. Basically if you can afford them buy them I wish I'd taken the plunge years ago. Being wireless too just feels luxurious some how
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Great set of headphones!
customer_reviews.text: Great set of headphones from Bose, however I wasn't happy with the delay between sound coming from a bluetooth device to the headphones. It's actually very noticeable and during calls this is distracting. I didn't expect this from top of the range bose headphones, so was disappointed. If you're using this purely to listen to music or watch videoes, that is fine. But for real time conversations the delay was too much for me. I suggest sticking with using wired headphones
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Just that it did not meet my requirement. Nothing bad about Bose
customer_reviews.text: It was my dream to buy Bose headphones for very long long time, but surely did not meet my expectation, so had to returned it. Many of my friends own it and they have always boasted about it. Maybe it is my personal experience, volume was not loud enough, bass was just ok, I got pain around my ears. Used it for 2 days and me and my wife decided to return it. I am still not convinced that I did not like Bose which I waited for so long. It could be that - may be not my types. It is fine, nothing bad about Bose, they are great.
customer_reviews.author: Santosh Setty

customer_reviews.title: My best tech purchase for years, superb sound and build quality, made to last!
customer_reviews.text: Crisp, clear and breathtaking sound with an exceptional build quality and seamless connectivity to all my devices. If you're thinking about purchasing these then don't hesitate, they're everything you would expect from Bose and more. Worth every penny as I know they will last me for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Initially delighted but noise quality and hearing issues occurred
customer_reviews.text: Bought early June as a gift. First use husband was delighted with the sound quality of the product. On about the third use he noticed an underlying noise, which has persisted with the headphones to date. At the same time he noticed ear pain, which started during use and ran on for a day or two after use. He took a break from the headphones for a couple of weeks, using them again this weekend, and sadly noise and ear pain continued. They have been returned as faulty to Amazon, who as usual were exemplary in after sales support.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs H Portlock

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic purchase
customer_reviews.text: Had these over a year now and thought it best to give a review. Do I wish I bought the noise cancelling ones? Yes. Could I afford to or bring myself to part with nearly £300 for them? No I am still happy with my purchase? Yes. You get fantastic sound quality with these along with amazing battery life. I've used them for conference calls, running, going to the gym and they've been fantastic. Sweat is no issue with these and if replacement ear pads are cheap to find online. If money wasn't an issue I'd have splashed on the ones above but these are the best value for money in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: TV - beware, it doesn't pair !
customer_reviews.text: If you intend to pair with your TV.. forget it, it doesn't (and no amout of cussing at it will change it). From the Bose web site: "Do these headphones work with my TV? Would they work with a Bluetooth transmitter? No. Many TVs do not have wireless Bluetooth functionality. Although a transmitter will technically work, the experience does not meet Bose expectations. There will be a distracting delay between the audio and video that detracts from the experience. " Note that's the Bose web site, unfortunately Amazon doesn't mention this 'feature'.
customer_reviews.author: Mr S.

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: Just upgraded to these. Previously had 2 pairs of Skullcandy Hesh 2.0,which were decent for noise cancelling, and i thought excellent for classical music paired with the robust sound on my Honor Play phone. These are just a different level. The noise cancellation is superior, it feels as though i can sense the strings vibrate in a string quartet. And that coda at the end of Philip Glass ' 9th symphony on low strings, which is not in the score, is now fully revealed.
customer_reviews.author: glassophile

customer_reviews.title: Mic doesn't works well
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is great but whenever I try making calls with this, it seems like mic doesn't work at all. Seems like the mic is just for noise-canceling. But description sys otherwise. When paired with my laptop, laptop detects just headphones and no audio input device so I can't use it to make calls from the laptop. UPDATE: I used Whatsapp based support system, and it solved my problem. I think there was some setup issue initially, and now mic works fine with all my same devices.
customer_reviews.author: Jayesh Garg

customer_reviews.title: superb quality
customer_reviews.text: As a first time buyer of Bose products, i had heard of their reputation and i was not disappointed. The quality of the materials and build are superb, and the sound is fantastic. The Bose connect app is the only flaw as it could provide a lot more info than it does but i am very happy with the phones. Sound is superb they are light and not to heavy to wear for long periods. very pleased with them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great audio experience, poor passive noise isolation
customer_reviews.text: The headphones produce very good sound output and my music and video and audio experience is so much better now. However, they don't form a good seal around my ears, and all extraneous sounds come through loud and clear. I have to crank up the volume to drown out outside noises. I think this is best used indoors, in a relatively quiet environment, as the audio quality is really good.
customer_reviews.author: Roshan Mani

customer_reviews.title: the best
customer_reviews.text: Im a film student and I have started to replace my "old" equipment with new. I have never had BOSE before but I was a fan of the brand and quality of every product I tried. My friends told me I won't regret buying them and they were right !!! I bought them on sale and Im more than impressed by the performance of the product. Simply said I got what I need and the price was more than reasonable.. It was reduced 2 times after I bought them and Amazon and the seller refund to my account the difference and I didn't even ask for it which was more than great. thank you :)
customer_reviews.author: Anatoli Stoyanov

customer_reviews.title: Generally positive feedback but few glitches with iPhone 7
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this item a while back and used it regularly for few months now. The main reason for this purchase was to use it with Apple TV 4K and it works perfectly fine. Sound quality is good, connectivity is perfect, very comfortable, can wear for hours, battery life is amazing, loudest volume won't blow you away but it doesn't bother me at all. I also connected it to my iPhone 7 and while it works generally fine, sometimes (strangely only noticed it outside) the sound starts to glitch when listening to the music, which is strange.
customer_reviews.author: Jack T

customer_reviews.title: Best headphones I’ve ever owned!
customer_reviews.text: These Bose headphones are incredible. I’ve owned many headphones including beats solo 2 and 3. I’ve also owned a different pair of Bose as well. I was very surprised with how high quality these headphones are for such a low price. I’m crazy into music and these headphones have great quality of sound, base, battery life and good comfort. I prefer these headphones to solo beats 100%. I’ve never actually owned a pair of studios but I feel like Bose have overall better quality than beats. I 100% recommend these headphones to any curious buyers!
customer_reviews.author: Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Bose Headphones
customer_reviews.text: Very nicely packaged and obviously a premium package. But, it had background static which annoyed my autistic son very badly. He has very good hearing and wants a clear sound that is not affected by interference. So I had to return these and he has stuck with his cabled Sony's. I have bought Bose Acoustimass Speakers before and those were brilliant, but sadly these did not hit the target for my son.
customer_reviews.author: The B.

customer_reviews.title: First rate headphones
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are the best I've ever had, they look good, are very comfortable and sound absolutely fantastic. There is absolutely no unwanted sound at all - nothing but the music which is reproduced to such a high quality you feel as though you could be in the concert hall.
customer_reviews.author: R. Mills

customer_reviews.title: Bose headphones
customer_reviews.text: I am deaf so not notice any better than a £20 bluetooth set That is what I wrote when I first tried these headphone - Bit now they have opened up a whole new world for me - My favourite app Fire-stick is Amazon in the setting I can simply set my Wi-Fi Bose headphones up by Bluetooth and the sounds that it has introduced to be is absolutely Amazing it’s like being in a cinema now - I cannot live without these headphone now
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Sound great, and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Firstly, tghese are not true noise cancelling headphones, hence the 3 starts in that department ! Hving said that, when playing music, or an audiobook through them, there is very little ambient sound due to the great padding around the earphones. They are light, very comfortable, and sound great. Also, they come with a case, so there is NO NEED to buy one.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Hickling

customer_reviews.title: Good quality headphones
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these in the Amazon Summer sales, so I got a great deal. Even though these have been about for many years, the quality still shines through. They fit comfortably and snuggly on the head and they're not too big that it makes you look like you have two muffins on the side of your head. Battery life is fantastic as is the noise cancellation. The sound quality is crisp and clear, I just wish it had the bass that my old Beats gave me. Otherwise, a fantastic set of headphones if you can pick up in an Amazon deal.
customer_reviews.author: richieloco

customer_reviews.title: Immersive!
customer_reviews.text: My first pair arrived and I was immersed in the sound. Although these headphone have no active noise cancellation, they manage to cut out most noise just by the fit. The sound quality on top of this is brilliant and you are transported into your movie or song. I made a call using these however and unfortunately the other person couldn’t hear me. A quick google showed that the microphone not working is a known issue with some models of this headphone. Amazon were great and promptly issued a replacement set to me which now work without fault. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: MJPZX2

customer_reviews.title: Nothing special
customer_reviews.text: I accept the product today, so exciting to try it out. My first impression, the sound quality is far from amazing. It make my song just like normal song; it same as when I heard the song from my far cheaper headphone. I tried it for zoom meeting; it picks up a lot of background voice. I don't know why, but I feel a bit dizzy due to wear this item for only less than 10 minutes. Pros: - The headset so lightweight, the comfortability of the ear pads also unquestionable. - Ease to connect to devices, and seamless switch between devices. Hazel Free!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sujianto

customer_reviews.title: Great, mid-priced, over-head headphones
customer_reviews.text: I typically use this for the gym, but would be great for listening to audio-books or just casual listening. The bass and Max volume aren’t as great as other headphones but the treble and higher tones is amazing and very clear. Obviously it’s not a noise-cancelling headphone so doesn’t rank well for ambient sound reduction, but it’s enough to still enjoy what you’re listening to in a loud environment. For this price range perhaps one of the nicer headphones I’ve experienced and would thoroughly recommend if you want “nice” “long-standing” headphones on a budget.
customer_reviews.author: G E Dowd

customer_reviews.title: Rubbish as a headset
customer_reviews.text: Listening is fine, but there are two problems when using these as a headset (e.g. for a call). 1) I sound like I'm on the other side of the planet to other listeners. 2) The other people on the call can hear an echo of their own voice. If I switch headset, it stops.
customer_reviews.author: SharonUK

customer_reviews.title: Leads in inside pocket of carry case
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome headphones. Very comfortable on. Just don't wear earings with them as they soon become uncomfortable. The best I have owned The sound is the best as you would expect from these expensive headphones. You hear 2 people singing and one on backing vocals so clearly. Same for all the instruments. I I like the handy carry case that is included in the price. They look and sound great. I don't chat on the phone A lot. I don't know. I wouldn't use them for hands free while I'm driving as they will block sound from outside even for phone use.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. P. A. Wolfers

customer_reviews.title: Time for an update Bose
customer_reviews.text: I will make it quick.. Highs - Good fit Good sound with cable Lows - Loud hissing at low volumes and beeping in right ear. I have tried b&o H7, H9i B&W PX.. These units are far superior.. B&O had hissing at lower volumes but not as bad as Bose. B&W does not.. A decent set of cans for a product realised in 2015! I hope to see Bluetooth 5 and a refined product realise shortly. I had to return the item as it was unbearable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy and premium product
customer_reviews.text: Super nice and comfy product, haven't listened to it that much. It's probably gonna get warm, which wouldn't bother me especially in the winter :D Bad aspect is that the AUX connection is smaller than a typical 3.5mm headphonejack, but as it is a product ment to connect by Bluetooth it should not bother me any further.
customer_reviews.author: Stefano Lombardi

customer_reviews.title: Just no
customer_reviews.text: Don't know why it's asked me to review noise cancellation because there is none. The sound quality isn't great. The price is a rip off. Compared to other headphones it isn't that flexible. Wouldn't recommend. Buy some galaxy buds instead!
customer_reviews.author: Hazel

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 quality wireless and wired option headphones
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are top quality. Got enough weight in them to know they are quality and genuine parts but light enough to wear for extended period, comfy ear huggers too. Battery life is brilliant, sound quality and noise cancelling is superb. My son had used both wired and wireless (bluetooth enabled) and the sound quality is equally good in both modes. He mainly uses them on his PC when gaming, he gives them 10/10!
customer_reviews.author: A Horton

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant sound quality, with very good noise reduction. Comes with a neat carry case to protect the device. Bought these for my husband who suffers with PTSD/anxiety to help him cope with external sounds that can cause stress. Such as fireworks etc
customer_reviews.author: Joan Spain

customer_reviews.title: Overall Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good headset, battery lasts long, they're super easy to setup (really didnt even read the manual), has the bare minimum buttons that you need, and comes with a cord so you can plug it in as a regular headset in cases of like a plane or that you don't feel like wasting your battery, which is great, also comes with a nice protective case. Only two complaints, i thought they would isolate a bit more from the noise, and the microphone is really badly placed so usually its not really good for calls or such stuff, but other than that my experience with it has been great.
customer_reviews.author: Ida Sessarego

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Great sound quality and comfort. However, using wirelessly, sometimes I could hear a buzz especially in my right ear which was loud enough to be distracting and irritating. So I ordered a replacement, but the replacement had the same issue. It's a shame because otherwise I was happy with them, it's very disappointing to get this problem when you're buying a 'premium' brand. Should have gone for the sennheiser hd4.50. Only gave 3 stars because amazon were great about sending a replacement the next day.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Good all-round, with room for improvement
customer_reviews.text: Good things: sound quality, comfort on ears, cushioned headband, buttons are easy to use when on your head Not so good things: can take a while to connect to your device (especially if you've been using multiple devices as they try to connect to all the ones recently used and you have a voice telling you that it's trying to connect over and over...), battery life could definitely be better, they are rigid (i.e. don't fold up in any way and the cans only rotate fully in one direction)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Read this
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not worth the price. Was expecting much better quality. The Bluetooth disconnects, and when you call people it’s faint and sometimes breaks up. I literally received these today and the box was damaged because the deliver didn’t even ring the doorbell. I have an iPhone six so it should work. Would not recommend this company. I went to a Bose store and tried all of their products which were very poor for the price you pay for them. Do yourself a favor and buy from a better buyer
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Class above the rest
customer_reviews.text: I know they are not cheap and I wasn't sure about all the buzz about how good they are but now I've tried them I'm converted. Definitely a class above the rest. Sound superb quality excellent I'd say worth the extra money and will buy again when necessary.
customer_reviews.author: marty63

customer_reviews.title: Bose quality does not disappoint.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice sound. It's like having the ears of a 20 year old again. Very comfy to wear also. These aren't the noise cancelling variety but they do block out the world outside quite well. They come with a micro USB charging cable and a jack lead so it can be used via headphone socket.
customer_reviews.author: Steve F

customer_reviews.title: It's great but I'm now having issues with it
customer_reviews.text: I loved every about this 🎧. The music sounds clean and crisp. It's especially good when listening to mindful music. Ohh, phone calls are great too. The only negative is that its been just over a year and a half and the blue bits are now falling off and it keeps disconnecting from my phone
customer_reviews.author: La'Vonne

customer_reviews.title: not the same
customer_reviews.text: I already own a pair of these and they are great except for the over the head bar breaking up, I ordered a second pair last week which looked great but were not the same as the ones I have, the max volume is much less and the sound is very flat compared to the ones I already own, returned for a refund as really very poor
customer_reviews.author: franbanks

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Music sounds way better than my older Beats, even if the battery life isnt as good. Huge shout out for the '15 minute charge and get 4 hours of music', as that really does work! They look great, sound amazing, and are so light you barely feel you are wearing them (its why the battery life isnt quite as long lasting as others). Brilliant headphones, and you should seriously consider them when looking for a treat for yourself!
customer_reviews.author: Lexxi

customer_reviews.title: Solid product
customer_reviews.text: Noise cancellation - I have managed to ignore many colleagues wearing these (unintentionally) Sound quality - to my ear (for the price) they aren’t the best in terms of sound quality but they are certainly useable. I’m sure I can tweak my Spotify settings to get these to work for me but this is an out the box review. They are however very comfortable Battery life - battery life is superb. I was hesitant about owning Bluetooth headphones as much older ones I have used had poor battery life. These, however, have a fantastic battery life
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: After 1 year - Doesn't charge!!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing for 1 year. Had them for a year and now the charge cuts out after 30 mins and then the battery isnt fully charged meaning I only get one hour of listening to music??? I really expected a long term durable product from Bose. Not sure what's gone wrong looking to see if there's any support around this issue?
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Powell

customer_reviews.title: Excellent headphones
customer_reviews.text: By far and away the best headphones I've ever had. The sound quality is excellent - crystal clear with a detailed mid range and top end, along with a fairly rich and bouncy bass. Easy to set up, supremely comfortable and with a long battery life between charges, they feel robust too. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Maisie Moo's Daddy

customer_reviews.title: Most important thing to know is; They are  Bose..!!
customer_reviews.text: They are Bose, what else needs to be said. Even the case is Quality, gives a certain amount of pride when you see people noticing them.. vain but true.
customer_reviews.author: Fozzy.

customer_reviews.title: Very good but don't last due to substandard materials being used.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic sound, brilliant battery life but.... *Update*!! I've just had to buy replacement earphone cushions as the original Bose ones have deteriorated to the point they have fallen off the headphones. For the price of the unit the cushions should last longer than this. Disappointed. Already looking at replacing them with a pair of Sennheiser.
customer_reviews.author: Average Consumer UK

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant Headphones, was a little wary about buying them ...
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant Headphones, was a little wary about buying them as I had not tried them first, but there was no need to worry. Super sound, good quality build & super service from the seller, VERY happy
customer_reviews.author: David kimber

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Sound
customer_reviews.text: I know these headphones are very expensive, but the sound quality is fantastic. As these are wireless headphones they are slight heavier than the wired models, but are a very comfortable fit. Wore them the whole day watching rugby world cup. Connects easily to a number of bluetooth devices and remembers each device. Instructions are very simple and holds charge very well. The design style is awesome. Very pleased with these and highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Rayment

customer_reviews.title: Hurt my ears after a few hours
customer_reviews.text: First off, I was expecting a blend of exquisite sound when compared to my cheap headphones. It could be my ears but I found the quality to be barely anything better than standard headphones. I also found these hurt my head/ears after a few hours as I wear glasses, so be warned.
customer_reviews.author: WMD

customer_reviews.title: CLASS
customer_reviews.text: Wow these are the business, got these for the gym, i know they are not a sport model but the ear cups can be replaced nice and easy, i have got a pair of sony WH 1000xm3 i have to say that there is £120 defreance and yes the sonys are better but for the price these Bose are really good, light comfortable and great sound, Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Dgt Whidden

customer_reviews.title: Simply Outstanding
customer_reviews.text: Not often I review products online but I felt compelled to on this occasion. My first pair of Bluetooth premium headphones.. I should’ve bought these years ago. The clarity and bass levels are awesome and without drowning out the vocals across all music genres which remain sharp. These are not advertised as noise cancelling headphones but it sure seems like they are. Paired with Spotify running the in-app settings at the highest stream/download quality with the ‘rock’ equaliser. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Kev T

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful sound, comfy and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Comfort sound brilliant awaiting the mp3 player now to put music on Sending to mother in carehome as she is mostly now sleeping and drifting I have given stars for battery but not actually had fr a length of time yet! I know by reputation They will be comfy for my 86 yr old Mother so great
customer_reviews.author: MS S  M WALLIS

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and quality
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and sound typical Bose workmanship. My personal only small gripe is the ear covers can make your ears a little hot if your quite busy. But I’m sure this can be sorted with different covers I’ve just not looked. All in all I think they are excellent around ear head phones ( cans) and I wouldn’t hesitate to recommend them. Some might be put off with the price but you get what you pay for so think longevity. You do get a case and charge cable/wire connection so don’t buy these unless you want two.
customer_reviews.author: royster

customer_reviews.title: Great for Rock music
customer_reviews.text: A fantastic set of headphones. They don’t have noise cancellation, but they are loud enough to keep the outside world out. The sound quality is excellent, they aren’t too bassy for the music I listen to and whilst they wont bring up the bass on And justice for all they certainly made it bearable. A genuinely excellent set. Easy to connect to a phone too.
customer_reviews.author: graham56

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, very comfortable, battery lasts ages
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with these, now I don't know how I used cheaper ones in the past. Stupidly thought I'd bought the noise cancelling ones, but very happy with these, don't seem to be disturbed by other sound around me especially if I'm listening to something. The cushioning and covering is so soft. Other headphones have made my ears sore after a wearing them for a while but I can happily wear these for hours on end. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Love these headphones really comfortable and great sound use them daily for walking and no problems so far they stay connected via bluetooth so far no drop outs charge once a week but that would depend on use mine are used for a minimum of 2 hours a day tried other makes before purchase and liked the sound of these best for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen E.

customer_reviews.title: Could be louder
customer_reviews.text: People seem to rave about Bose so I bought these. These are okay but not as good as studio headphones. I guess that should have been obvious but from the way people talk. So they're okay - comfy and like little ear muffs and some songs reveal sounds you haven't heard before. But I find them quite quiet and lacking punch.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Barraclough

customer_reviews.title: Microphone is rubbish, sound good and Bluetooth temperamental
customer_reviews.text: Microphone is rubbish, sound good and Bluetooth temperamental... I returend them twice and in the end realised they are not goof
customer_reviews.author: Nixon

customer_reviews.title: not for the picky
customer_reviews.text: As much as I love the brand I was seriously disappointed in this product. The sound quality is really poor with very weak bass. I tried them with both my iPhone and Samsung phones as well as PC, laptop and iPod... I wouldn't keep these even if they were £20!
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: Great but not for phonecalls.
customer_reviews.text: I love these headphones and the sound quality is great but the only issue I’ve experienced (which I think is quite a big issue depending what you’re using the headphones for) is that if you’re talking to someone on the phone using the headphones, they can barely hear you. I’ve been told this by people I’ve called but I’ve also been on the receiving end of a phone call when my boyfriend has been wearing them. Not sure if there is something you can do to sort this out but it’s bad enough that I wouldn’t use them for that purpose. Otherwise though - they’re great and I’m really happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Miss K L Brown

customer_reviews.title: An eary silence.
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are very good. I bought them for my mother who is quite deaf, she loves them, she can watchall her t.v. shows without subtitles and is very happy, We are very happy now too because we don'y have to listen to "Corry street" at warp facter ten!
customer_reviews.author: James Macdonald

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones
customer_reviews.text: These are great headphones, I've had them a little over 2 years and used them almost daily, my only criticism is that recently the coloured rubber around the earpiece on one side has started to come away from the solid plastic, it doesn't seem to affect performance or anything, it's just a bit ugly.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. D. G. Clough

customer_reviews.title: Great item, German instructions and voice but really easy ...
customer_reviews.text: Great item, German instructions and voice but really easy to use, very pleased with mine order. Great sound and what you expect from Bose, outside noise was blocked out buy the nice firm fit.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus Robinson

customer_reviews.title: brilliant set of headphones!!! worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Bose never fails to deliver great sound quality. These headphones are amazing. the only downside i can say about these is that its quite hard to hear the full quality of the speakers at lower volume levels. When the volume is cranked up there's no loss in sound. very comfortable to wear like the Bose QC35 but exterior sound blocking is not the best (it isn't advertised as such) .
customer_reviews.author: Ajit Dadar

customer_reviews.title: ... are worth buying simply because they're so light and comfortable, excellent sound the bluetooth is excellent and connects ...
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are worth buying simply because they're so light and comfortable, excellent sound the bluetooth is excellent and connects to a device automatically, once it has been connected the first time, without having to keep pairing
customer_reviews.author: ronald campbell

customer_reviews.title: Amazing stylish and do what they claim
customer_reviews.text: I have a hearing difficulty and these are a godsend. I can hear sounds I’ve never heard. They are stylish with good battery life. They are not classsd as noise cancelling but I feel they are. They are pricey but I personally feel they are worth it. They are Bose after all and they don’t get it wrong.
customer_reviews.author: mary

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy for TV use
customer_reviews.text: A good basic headset for listening to music but not suitable for watching television. The lip sync is frequently misaligned. It is possible to correct this by repeatedly turning the headset on and off until the desired result is achieved.
customer_reviews.author: Edward

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: Excellent head phones. Comfy and excellent sound. Marked it down as mine did not have the lead to connect to charge or the lead for using whilst not using WiFi. I did not complain as we have these leads already as we own many Bose items.
customer_reviews.author: Bevtboop

customer_reviews.title: you get waht you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I've ben really impressed with these headphones. its the first time I've used wireless and have to say I have nothing but praise for the sound quality, length of battery life and the speed with which they connect to the iPhone 7. extremely comfortable and lightweight I use these for commuting from Brighton to London and for walking the dog mainly and aside from the obvious fact that I'm listening to music its easy to forget that you have them on. the instructions were very easy to follow and they're simple to set up and couple with the iPhone 7. yes they're expensive but I think you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Mark P.

customer_reviews.title: What quality sounds like.
customer_reviews.text: While not noise canceling, the crisp powerful sound will caress your ears lovingly. This headphones are so good they are gonna be the paragon for all of your future headphones. Only sad note... Their a tad fragile. If the plastic brakes there's no saving them.
customer_reviews.author: Gabry87

customer_reviews.title: Sorry, what did you say?
customer_reviews.text: I bought my wife these good quality head phones, you can certainly see where you money goes, I can highly recommend them... Sound quality is well rounded with plenty of clarity in the mids and bottom range, robust and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. M. J. Molnar

customer_reviews.title: DELIGHTED lovely head phones.
customer_reviews.text: What's to say !. Lovely wireless Bose head phones. Perfect. Pricy but without a doubt worth the money. Sound is excellent. Comfortable. Good battery life. Well made and look great. Nice to be able to pay over a few months also.
customer_reviews.author: Poppy

product_meta.title: Bose SoundLink Around-Ear Wireless Bluetooth Headphones II - White
product_meta.description:
Colour Name:WhiteEnjoy a better wireless experience with Bose SoundLink around-ear wireless headphones II. technology delivers deep, immersive sound at any volume, making them the high-sounding wireless headphones available. A dual microphone system rejects noise and wind so you'll be heard loud and clear and enhanced side tone makes your voice sound more natural. SoundLink wireless headphones use the latest Bluetooth technology so you can easily connect to your mobile devices with seamless audio/video sync and switch between two devices. For NFC-enabled devices, you can simply tap the right ear cup for quick pairing. A rechargeable lithium-ion battery lets you listen for up to 15 hours and gives you up to 2 hours of play time with a 15-minute charge. Effortless touch controls allow for simple command of your music and calls and voice prompts give you information about battery life, device connection and caller ID. SoundLink wireless headphones are lighter and more comfortable than other comparable wireless headphones so you can enjoy them all day long. Wear them almost anywhere and experience uncompromised wireless performance. Included: SoundLink around-ear headphones; detachable audio cable; carrying case. For NFC-enabled phones, simply turn on the headphones by sliding the three-position power switch to the middle position. Then tap the back side of your phone on the front of the right earcup where you see the embossed NFC logo, and follow the prompt to accept a connection. If you don't have an NFC-enabled phone, first, make sure that the headphones are turned on by sliding the power switch to the middle position. Next, press the power switch to the Bluetooth icon until the Bluetooth LED flashes blue or the voice-enhanced user interface gives you additional directions. Now, follow the directions within the smartphone’s Bluetooth menu to connect the headphones. The NFC function in iPhone 6/6 Plus or 7/7 Plus only enables Apple pay functionality. It doesn't facilitate pairing. Please use pairing instructions for phones that are not NFC enabled.

BOX CONTAINS
Headphone 
case
feature_bullets: Deep, immersive sound, improved EQ performance for wireless headphones. Care Tips:Do not allow moisture to get inside the earcups or the audio input connector. Do not use liquids or spray.
High microphone system, HD voice for clear calls in windy or noisy environments
Enhanced side tone so you sound more natural on calls and charging time is 3 hours' full charge is equal to 15 hours' play time (15-minute quick charge equals 2 hours' play time)
Switch between two Bluetooth devices so you can watch a video while staying connected to your smartphone
Latest Bluetooth technology for easy connectivity and seamless audio/video syncs , Ear cushion - 3.8 inches H x 2.9 inches W

specifications.Delivery information:: We cannot deliver certain products outside mainland UK ( ). We will only be able to confirm if this product can be delivered to your chosen address when you enter your delivery address at checkout.
